client.header.en: How can we help you today?
client.header.haw: Pehea mākou e kōkua ai iā ʻoe i kēia lā?
client.header.ptg: How we can help you today?

client.safe_question.haw: Ke palekana nei ʻoe i kēia manawa?

client.describe.haw: E haʻi mai i kou kūlana

client.consent.en: I agree to share this information so we can help
client.consent.haw: ʻAe wau e kaʻana i kēia ʻike no ke kōkua
client.consent.ptg: I like share dis so you can help me
